author: editorial@examiner.co.uk (Faye Preston)
title: Yorkshire seaside town's own 'microclimate' makes it the warmest place to be in the county
text: Trips to the seaside may be reserved for the summer months but there’s a North Yorkshire seaside town that could buck this trend. There’s something rather lovely about a blustery day by the coast but when you combine that with the fact this seaside town is actually warmer than any other part in Yorkshire, it makes it a no brainer. Sandsend in [ North Yorkshire ](https://www.examinerlive.co.uk/all-about/north-yorkshire) is said to have its own microclimate. This means it is warmer than any other part of Yorkshire - something that could be contributing to the town’s reputation as one of the most popular places to visit on the [ Yorkshire Coast ](https://www.examinerlive.co.uk/all-about/yorkshire-coast). Read more: [Live as 61 flood warnings and alerts see roads shut across Yorkshire](https://www.examinerlive.co.uk/news/local-news/flooding-live-61-warnings-alerts-28386957) With its stunning stretch of beach and breathtaking views over the Cleveland Way, thousands of tourists flock to the village every single summer. Such is its popularity, [ house prices in the area to surge to around £1,000,000. ](https://www.examinerlive.co.uk/news/local-news/life-tiny-yorkshire-seaside-hamlet-23282377) The small village is about three miles from Whitby and you can see the famous Abbey and harbour in the distance while on the beach. Its in close proximity to the stunning North York Moors and opportunities to go sailing and golfing nearby also add to Sandsend's appeal. But what makes this tiny place all the more interesting and appealing to visitors is its very own microclimate - which makes Sandsend warmer than any other place in Yorkshire. Day-trippers from near and far flock to the beach on sunny days to enjoy the seaside towns scorching hot and sunny weather. It can often be raining in neighbouring towns such as Whitby or Scarborough but Sandsend will remain bathed in sunshine. This is because coastal town has what is known as a maritime climate or oceanic climate - which essentially gives the town milder seasons, or 'better weather' depending on whether you prefer cold or warmth. It very rarely snows, although conditions did make a treacherous drop when temperatures fell below 0C and 'danger to life' warnings were in place across parts of Yorkshire last month, in December.

author: ANI
title: UP-based cow slaughtering gang busted, three accused arrested: Delhi Police | Headlines
text: A four-wheeler vehicle used in the commission of the crime has also been recovered. [ANI](/ani-stories)| Updated: 29-12-2023 08:14 IST | Created: 29-12-2023 08:14 IST - Country: - India With the arrest of three accused, police claimed to have busted a UP-based cow-slaughtering gang active in Delhi-NCR, police said. "Delhi Police Joint Team of AATS/NED and PS Karawal Nagar busted a cow slaughtering gang of Sambhal (UP) active in Delhi-NCR and solved the cow slaughtering case and arrested three accused," police said. According to the police, the apprehended accused have been identified as Wajhat alias Ajju (32), Jahane Alam alias Jahna (30), and Sajid alias Sadva (28). All the accused are residents of UP's Amroha district. A four-wheeler vehicle used in the commission of crime has also been recovered, police said. The main accused, Sajid alias Sadwa, is a notorious criminal who was caught earlier by UP Police in an encounter, and he came out of jail in July 2023. According to North East Delhi DCP Joy Tirkey, a PCR call was received in Karawal Nagar police station on December 24 informing that some severed heads of cow and other parts were found near Janki Panchal Vihar, Karawal Nagar, Delhi. Accordingly, a case under Section 429 and 424(4) of the IPC and Section 12 of the Prevention of Cruelty Against Animals Act was registered at Karawal Nagar Police Station, and an investigation was subsequently taken up. During the course of the investigation, all possible efforts were made to trace the accused persons. Several CCTV footages were analysed, and upon analysing the CCTV footage, a 'Honda City' car was found involved in the case, police said. The route of the car was followed, and it was found that three people disembarked from the car near Seemapuri Depot, Delhi. Based on collected inputs and information, the police zeroed in on three suspected persons and succeeded in apprehending them from their rented accommodation in Old Mustafabad, Delhi. On verification, their identities were established. On sustained interrogation, the apprehended accused confessed to their crime and further disclosed that they procured the 'Xylaxin' injections used to make cows unconscious from a chemist in Jafrabad and used to lift stray cows from various areas of Delhi-NCR. According to the police, 17 syringes and 34 needles were also recovered from their possession. All three accused persons have been found to be dreaded criminals, previously involved in more than 15 cow slaughtering cases registered in Nagli (UP), Shalimar Bagh, and Gokulpuri, while other locations are still being verified, police said. (ANI) (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.)

author: PTI
title: Empowering Communities: CBRN Preparedness Workshop Highlights Safety and Coordination | Science-Environment
text: Empowering Communities: CBRN Preparedness Workshop Highlights Safety and Coordination A collaborative CBRN awareness workshop organized by the National Disaster Management Authority and Palghar District Disaster Management Authority highlighted preparedness for nuclear and chemical emergencies. It featured key stakeholders and experts conducting interactive sessions and practical exercises. The workshop aimed to enhance community actions and medical management strategies for CBRN incidents. [PTI](/pti-stories)| Palghar | Updated: 21-06-2024 22:11 IST | Created: 21-06-2024 22:11 IST - Country: - India A comprehensive CBRN (Chemical, Biological, Radiological, Nuclear) awareness workshop organized by the National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) and the Palghar District Disaster Management Authority concluded on Friday, an official said. The workshop aimed at sharpening preparedness for potential nuclear and chemical emergencies witnessed active participation from key stakeholders, including representatives from the Tarapur Nuclear Power Plant and the Bhabha Atomic Research Centre. Key topics discussed included the benefits of nuclear power, community actions during off-site emergencies, medical management strategies for CBRN incidents, and practical exercises on radiation management. Expert-led interactive sessions featured prominent figures such as Abhishek Sharma from NDMA, Senior Advisor Rajnish Piplani, and Commander Santosh Bahadur Singh from NDRF. Collector Gobind Bodke, along with 50 other attendees from revenue, disaster management, police, civil defence, health, and rural development departments, as well as villagers, participated in the workshop, the official added. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.) author: VNExplorer
title: Isabel Allende y la censura de libros en escuelas de Estados Unidos: "Es vergonzoso"
text:
Isabel Allende y la censura de libros en escuelas de Estados Unidos: “Es vergonzoso”
La escritora chilena Isabel Allende manifestó su oposición “absoluta” a la prohibición de libros, ello tras la inclusión de dos novelas suyas en una lista de casi 700 obras literarias retiradas este año de las aulas escolares de un condado de Florida, Estados Unidos.
“Es vergonzoso y peligroso en una democracia”, alertó la autora en una declaración escrita enviada a EFE este jueves.
Las escuelas del condado floridano de Orange retiraron de las aulas un total de 673 títulos este 2023, entre los que figuran la que es la novela más celebrada de la autora, ‘La casa de los espíritus’ (1982), además de ‘Más allá del invierno’ (2017), que en ambos casos abordan asuntos relacionados con la sexualidad.
El retiro de las obras se debe a una ley estatal, promovida y promulgada por el gobernador de Florida, el republicano Ron DeSantis, que limita en las escuelas obras literarias que tengan alusiones sexuales o LGBTQ+.
“Esta medida tendrá el efecto contrario al deseado por el gobernador, ya que basta que algo se les prohíba a los jóvenes para que quieran leerlo”, aseveró la escritora, quien reside en Estados Unidos.
La chilena recalcó que no es la única autora censurada en el sur de Estados Unidos, ni tampoco la primera vez que la vetan en las escuelas ya que años atrás “La Casa de los Espíritus” fue censurada en Carolina del Norte, pero “un grupo de maestros defendió el libro ante la Junta de Educación del estado (Board of Education) y lo reinstalaron”, relató.
Entre los títulos retirados por las autoridades escolares del condado de Orange, donde se asienta la ciudad de Orlando, figuran obras de otros celebrados autores latinoamericanos como Gabriel García Márquez, cuyas novelas ‘El amor en los tiempos del cólera’ (1985) y ‘Crónica de una muerte anunciada’ (1981) ya no están en las aulas.

author: 8world.com
title: 男子穿女装替考 中南大：拟开除学生学籍 - 8world
text: 网民流传帖文表示，中国中南财经政法大学的考试场里，有一名男子穿着女装替考，引起网民热议。 该大学表示，有学生作出违纪舞弊行为，委托他人代为考试，大学拟对该学生作出开除学籍处分的决定。武汉中南财经政法大学教务部昨天（25日）表示，会计学院一名本科生在前天（24日）的《高级会计学》考试中委托他人代她参加考试。据澎湃新闻报道，校方依据《中南财经政法大学全日制学生考试违纪舞弊处理办法（修订）》第九条第二款的相关规定，拟对这名本科生作出开除学籍的处分决定。目前，处分决定正处于公示阶段。据校方通报，涉事代考人员与这名本科生通过网络平台结识，事发后逃离现场，身份仍在进一步核实调查中。网民前天上午在社交平台表示，在该校《高级会计学》考试中，有男子身穿女装替考被当场查获。相关帖文及考场论坛截图在网络上迅速传播，引起热议。有网民透露，“听说是戴假发和口罩去考试的，然后被监考老师发现了。”中南财经政法大学考务与学位管理办公室的工作人员受访时表示，相关情况仍在调查中，具体处理结果将通过学校教务部官网通报。

author: Decatur Daily Democrat
title: Unlock Seamless Travel to New Zealand with Online Visa Solutions | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: In a bid to simplify and streamline the visa application process, New Zealand proudly announces the launch of its online visa platform. The new system, known as the New Zealand ETA (Electronic Travel Authorization) application, is designed to provide a more accessible and efficient means for global travelers, including those from New Zealand's long-time partner, India. NEW ZEALAND ETA APPLICATION FORM The heart of this innovative approach is the user-friendly New Zealand ETA application form. This online form offers a seamless experience for applicants, eliminating the need for traditional paper-based applications. With just a few clicks, individuals can initiate their visa application process, marking a significant departure from the conventional and often time-consuming methods. Understanding the eligibility criteria for the New Zealand ETA is crucial for a smooth application process. The New Zealand government has meticulously outlined the eligibility requirements, ensuring transparency for all applicants. The eligibility criteria encompass various factors, including the purpose of the visit, duration of stay, and the applicant's background. For those seeking to explore the breathtaking landscapes and vibrant culture of New Zealand, the Tourist Visa option is now more accessible than ever. The online platform enables individuals to apply for a New Zealand Tourist Visa from the comfort of their homes. This development aims to attract more global tourists, fostering cross-cultural exchanges and contributing to New Zealand's thriving tourism sector. The New Zealand Visa online application process involves a few simple steps. Applicants can visit the official New Zealand government website and navigate to the dedicated ETA section. The user-friendly interface guides them through the application form, where they input essential details. This includes personal information, travel plans, and other pertinent details required for visa processing. The digital platform allows applicants to upload the necessary documents seamlessly. From proof of identity to travel itineraries, the online system ensures a straightforward process. This eliminates the need for physical document submissions, reducing both time and effort for applicants. One of the noteworthy advantages of the New Zealand visa online system is the expedited processing time. Unlike traditional methods, where visa approvals may take weeks, the online platform aims to provide quicker turnarounds. This feature is particularly beneficial for those with imminent travel plans, ensuring they receive their New Zealand ETA promptly. The introduction of the online visa platform symbolizes a commitment to fostering global collaborations and deepening the friendship between India and New Zealand. As two nations with shared values and a long-standing partnership, this initiative reflects New Zealand's dedication to providing Indian citizens with a more convenient avenue to explore its beauty and culture. By making the New Zealand ETA accessible to global travelers, New Zealand aims to encourage travel, promote tourism, and build bridges between nations. The online visa platform is a testament to New Zealand's commitment to embracing technological advancements for the betterment of travel experiences. The introduction of the New Zealand ETA application form marks a new chapter in the country's visa application process. With an emphasis on accessibility, efficiency, and transparency, the online platform is poised to redefine the way global travelers, including those from India, embark on their journeys to New Zealand. This strategic move not only aligns with the global shift towards digitalization but also underscores New Zealand's dedication to providing an unparalleled travel experience for visitors worldwide. Media Contact Company Name: New Zealand Visa Application Contact Person: Janet Edwards Email: Send Email Country: New Zealand Website: newzealand-visa.org/visa/

author: David Marques
title: Liga das Nações: Portugal-Croácia, 2-1 (destaques) - CNN Portugal
text: [Portugal-Croácia](/tag/Portugal-Cro%25C3%25A1cia) Liga das Nações: Portugal-Croácia, 2-1 (destaques) E ele insiste, teimosamente, em continuar a fazer História E ele insiste, teimosamente, em continuar a fazer História A FIGURA: Cristiano Ronaldo Depois de mais uma fase final sem golos, o avançado português respondeu às críticas com um jogo muito positivo. O golo 900 abrilhantou-lhe a noite, mas CR7 foi mais do que esse momento. Jogou de forma associativa e pisou os espaços certos. Antes do golo esteve perto de marcar numa das jogadas coletivas mais bonitas da noite e ainda assistiu Nuno Mendes, já na segunda parte, para uma boa ocasião de golo negada por Livakovic. O MOMENTO: minuto 34. Golo 900 da carreira de Cristiano Ronaldo Aos 39 anos pode não ser o jogador de outros tempos. Perdeu capacidade de drible, velocidade, mas continua a ser um dos homens mais letais nas áreas contrárias. O cruzamento de Nuno Mendes foi perfeito, mas a forma como CR7 finalizou de primeira meteu respeito. A História a escrever-se à nossa frente: na Luz, a 5 de setembro de 2024, o maior goleador de sempre do futebol mundial chegou aos 900 golos oficiais na carreira, 131 de quinas ao peito. OUTROS DESTAQUES Bruno Fernandes: teve, tal como muitos dos companheiros, um Euro 2024 individualmente aquém das expetativas, talvez muito por culpa do peso que uma época inteira teve [num dos jogadores mais utilizados do Mundo](https://maisfutebol.iol.pt/observatorio-do-futebol/cies/estudo-bruno-fernandes-lidera-em-minutos-na-europa-aursnes-em-portugal). A leveza que ainda tem nas pernas em 2024/25 nota-se mesmo à distância, lá bem perto da cobertura do Estádio da Luz. Na forma como procura a bola, como compensa defensivamente as limitações defensivas de Rafael Leão e na agilidade mental que lhe permite tomar, como poucos, boas decisões. Como na assistência para o golo de Dalot e numa triangulação perfeita com Leão e Ronaldo que adiou alguns minutos o golo 900 de CR7 na carreira. Diogo Dalot: inaugurou o marcador ao aparecer com um movimento à ponta de lança numa zona onde é pouco habitual um lateral-direito aparecer. Na segunda parte negou de carrinho uma excelente ocasião de golo de Pasalic numa transição perigosa. Um autogolo foi um percalço num jogo muito consistente. Nuno Mendes: esteve ligado à corrente do primeiro ao último minuto, com desequilíbrios constantes pelo corredor esquerdo. Assistiu Cristiano Ronaldo para o golo 900 da carreira do avançado e ainda apareceu em condições de marcar em pelo menos duas ocasiões. Na primeira parte dividiu o flanco esquerdo com Rafael Leão, mas na segunda reclamou-o todo. E bem! Kramaric: o mais perigoso dos croatas na primeira parte. Disponibilidade física, mobilidade e poder de fogo. Ameaçou o golo, negado por Diogo Costa, aos 31 minutos e desequilibrou num movimento em profundidade na jogada do golo da Croácia a fechar a primeiro. Livakovic: nada podia fazer nos golos sofridos, mas fez muito para negar outros golos de Portugal. A Bruno Fernandes, a Cristiano Ronaldo e fica a sensação que ainda tocou de raspão naquela tentativa de Pedro Neto sacudida pela trave.

author: Agencias
title: Muere la actriz y cantante británica Marianne Faithfull
text:
Muere la actriz y cantante británica Marianne Faithfull
Musa de los Rolling Stones, entre sus éxitos se encuentra el tema 'As Tears Go By', escrito por Mick Jagger y Keith Richards.
Londres/La cantante británica Marianne Faithfull ha fallecido este jueves a los 78 años, según informó un portavoz de la artista. "Con profunda tristeza anunciamos la muerte de la cantautora y actriz Marianne Faithfull", anunciaron en un comunicado.
Entre los éxitos de la carrera de Faithfull se encuentra el tema As Tears Go By, escrito por Mick Jagger y Keith Richards, de los Rolling Stones.
Faithfull nació en 1946 en Londres y descendía de la nobleza austriaca por parte de madre, pero creció en el seno de una familia de clase media. Su carrera artística comenzó en 1964 tras conocer en una fiesta de los Rolling Stones al mánager de la banda, Andrew Loog Oldham.
Su single debut, As Tears Go By, escrito por Mick Jagger y Keith Richards, la catapultó al top 10 de las listas de éxitos del Reino Unido en ese mismo año.
Asimismo, también comenzó a dar sus primeros pasos en el cine y protagonizó películas como La chica de la motocicleta o Hamlet a finales de los años 60, junto a artistas como Orson Welles o Alain Delon.
Fue considerada como una musa de los Rolling Stones, pues mantuvo una relación con Jagger durante cuatro años, y su figura inspiró canciones de la banda como Wild Horses.
Sin embargo, su reputación se vio marcada por su adicción a las drogas y en 1970 se separó de Jagger, perdió la custodia de su hijo y llegó a vivir en la calle.
Una década más tarde regresó a la música con su álbum Broken English (1979), que le valió una nominación a los Premios Grammy, y se alejó de las drogas.
Faithfull atravesaba graves problemas de salud. En 2006 se sometió a una cirugía tras un diagnóstico de cáncer de mama; un año más tarde anunció que padecía hepatitis C desde hacía más de una década y, en 2020, contrajo el Covid-19 y estuvo hospitalizada.
